name: Choconoa
description: Choconoa is a 3D Platformer in the world of pastries!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-750 @ 2.67GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965 @ 3.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
